enhanced_by.reason: addEnforcedAttribute requires the tag to be added to the allowed tag list if necessary, similar to addTags.
Both methods involve adding attributes to tags, though addEnforcedAttribute specifically enforces a value.
removeEnforcedAttribute should be tested before and after addEnforcedAttribute to ensure proper state management.
getEnforcedAttributes should be tested after addEnforcedAttribute to verify the enforced attributes are correctly retrieved.
